title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder and relating
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Heritage Fund (Transfer of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Heritage Fund (Transfer of 

Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2021. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 31 March 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited heritage fund (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2021 (2) order come operation 31 march 2021

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder and relating
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of the functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media. 

(2) References to the Department of Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder and relating 
to any administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Department of 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium (2) reference department housing local government heritage contained act instrument made thereunder relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder and relating
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Housing, Local Government
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage by or under the Heritage Fund Act 2001 (No. 44 of 2001) are 
transferred to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media. 

(2) References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage contained in any Act or instrument made under thereunder and 
relating 
the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

this Article shall, from 

transferred by 

the functions 

to

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder and relating
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage is a party and the proceedings have reference to the functions 
transferred by this Order to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media, the name of the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any 
function transferred by this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of 
the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage or added in the 
proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by 
reason of such substitution. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [185] 3

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder and relating
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage may, in so far as it relates to the functions transferred by this Order to 
the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, be carried 
on or completed on or after such commencement by the Minister for Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister housing local government heritage may far relates function transferred order minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium carried completed commencement minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder and relating
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made 
in the exercise of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as it 
was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, has effect 
from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder and relating
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage contained in the memorandum and articles of association of any 
company and relating to any function transferred by this Order shall, from the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.
text_norm: 7 reference minister housing local government heritage contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made thereunder and relating
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before 
the commencement of this Order by the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage, in connection with the functions transferred by this 
Order are transferred to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media and, accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or 
assignment, on such commencement – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, 

those rights are rights of the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media by this Article which, on 
the commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage shall, on the request of the Minister 
for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, be transferred into the 
name of the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [185] 

GIVEN under the Official of the Government, 

30 March, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
